explains: n. 人本主义，人文主义；人文学科研究
wordGroup: renaissance humanism n. 文艺复兴时期的人文主义

sentences.en: One of the most notable features for the cultural outlook of the modern western humanism is anti-technolatry.
sentences.cn: 反科技主义是现代西方人本主义文化观最显着的特征之一。

sentences.en: Put together, humanism, psychology, semiotic and design.
sentences.cn: 把人本主义，心理学，符号学和设计糅合到一起，我们得到的是“交互设计”。

sentences.en: It was exquisite in style and form, full of humanism and love.
sentences.cn: 精致的样式和风格，充满了人文主义和关怀。
